scripts.doc:framework: npm run build:framework && cd projects/yuuvis/framework && npm run doc
scripts.doc:core: npm run build:core && cd projects/yuuvis/core && npm run doc
scripts.doc:core:json: npm run build:core && cd projects/yuuvis/core && npm run doc:json
scripts.doc:framework:json: npm run build:core && cd projects/yuuvis/framework && npm run doc:json
scripts.doc:all: npm run doc:core && npm run doc:framework
scripts.extract:merge:all: npm run extract:framework && node ./tools/scripts/common/i18n --lib=framework && npm run extract:app && node ./tools/scripts/common/i18n-merge --run
scripts.build:libs:all: npm run build:core && npm run build:framework
scripts.build:web: npm run prebuild:about && npm run build:libs:all && npm run build:client:only && npm run prepare:dist
scripts.build:pwa: npm run prebuild:about && npm run build:libs:all && npm run build -- --configuration production --base-href /clientdev/ && node ./tools/scripts/misc/replace-start-url --url=/clientdev/ && npm run prepare:dist
scripts.build:pwa:loc: npm run prebuild:about && npm run build:libs:all && npm run build -- --configuration production --base-href /yuuvis-flokfugl/ && node ./tools/scripts/misc/replace-start-url --url=/yuuvis-flokfugl/ && npm run prepare:dist
scripts.docker:create:image: npm run docker:create:tag && cd docker && create-image.bat
scripts.k8s:deploy: cd dist/k8s && kubectl apply -f namespace.yaml -f deployment.yaml -f service.yaml
scripts.deploy:dist: npm run docker:create:image && npm run k8s:prepare && npm run k8s:deploy
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build:pwa && npm run docker:create:image && npm run k8s:prepare && npm run k8s:deploy
scripts.pack:lib:core: npm run build:core && cd lib-release &&  npm pack ../dist/yuuvis/core
scripts.pack:lib:framework: npm run build:framework && cd lib-release &&  npm pack ../dist/yuuvis/framework
scripts.pack:libs:all: npm run pack:lib:core && npm run pack:lib:framework
scripts.unpublish:libs:all: npm run unpublish:lib:core && npm run unpublish:lib:framework
scripts.publish:lib:core: npm run pack:lib:core && npm run unpublish:lib:core && npm publish ./lib-release/yuuvis-core-0.0.1.tgz
scripts.publish:lib:framework: npm run pack:lib:framework && npm run unpublish:lib:framework && npm publish ./lib-release/yuuvis-framework-0.0.1.tgz
scripts.publish:libs:all: npm run publish:lib:core && npm run publish:lib:framework
